1.title: Ninety
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Based on a comic book by writer Matthew McLean, Ninety follows two scientist who both share a passion for preservation of our future although through completely different means. Andalus a Malthusian believes that the planet can not sustain all of humanity and in order for the planet and humanity to survive Ninety percent must perish. Haven uses technology to give the planet and humanity a fighting chance. Haven has been able to augment the Ninety percent of the foreign organisms in our bodies to given individuals abilities. Will we be the Ninety percent to perish or can the Ninety percent in each of us be enough to save us.
imdb.title: Ninety
plot: Using skills obtained from an ancient artifact Dr. Andalus is determined to save the Earth by culling the population effectively getting rid of ninety percent of humanity. Dr. Haven who was empowered by the same artifact is our only hope.::Carlton Hickman

Based on a comic book by writer Matthew McLean, _Ninety_ (qv) follows two scientist who both share a passion for preservation of our future although through completely different means. Andalus a Malthusian believes that the planet can not sustain all of humanity and in order for the planet and humanity to survive _Ninety_ (qv) percent must perish. Haven uses technology to give the planet and humanity a fighting chance. Haven has been able to augment the _Ninety_ (qv) percent of the foreign organisms in our bodies to given individuals abilities. Will we be the _Ninety_ (qv) percent to perish or can the _Ninety_ (qv) percent in each of us be enough to save us.::Carlton HIckman
